description: This file declares the IEventHandler interface within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, which specifies callback methods for container lifecycle events such as start, stop, failure, and state change, passing JSON data as parameters.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface defining callback methods for handling container events.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has started; receives a JSON object with event data.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has stopped; receives a JSON object with event data.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has failed; receives a JSON object with event data.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container changes state; receives a JSON object with event data.
